summary: A young boy falls in love with a handsome policeman who is investigating his family's criminal activities.
cast: Nathan Lopez|Soliman Cruz|J.R. Valentin|Neil Ryan Sese|Ping Medina|Bodjie Pascua|Elmo Redrico|Ivan Camacho|Lucito Lopez|Jett Desalesa|Anastacio Cruz|Roychell Torre|Peter Anthony Tumbaga|Edwin Pamanian|Rodney Luengu|Claudine Najera|Rebecca Padilla|Arnold Cruz|Julius Ray Caringal|Buck Harold Pago|Remedios Calinangan|Pepe Smith
title: Ang pagdadalaga ni Maximo Oliveros
